CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 在…之内；在…范围内；在…的内部；在…的限度内；在…时间内；在…距离内；在…的领域内；不出（某范围或限度）
在范围之内；在界限以内

word_group.brief_definition: 在合理范围内；不过分
在某人双手的所及范围之内；够得着；力所能及；行程之内
适度地, 在某范围内
以便看到；以便能被…看见；在望；快要
一小时之内；不到一小时后
在攻击距离之内；成功的可能性很大
差点儿；贴近
在屋里
险些儿；差一点儿
差点儿；几乎
在可被呼叫传唤的范围之内；在附近
错综复杂的情况, 盘根错节
记忆中
在招呼得到的地方；在听得见的地方
很近的距离之内
在近处
被任命为王室法律顾问
看得到的；在某人的奋斗目标之中；在某人的预料之中
在…的距离之内
差点儿丧命
word_group.phrase: within an inch of one's life

bilingual.target: 在一个词中找到另一个词。

bilingual.source: There is no recognisable form within the painting.
bilingual.target: 画中没有可识别的形状。

bilingual.source: What do you think is the 'lesson' within the story?
bilingual.target: 你认为故事中的“教训”是什么？

bilingual.source: Ryan could get clean drinking water within ten steps.
bilingual.target: 瑞安可以在十步之内获得干净的饮用水。

bilingual.source: "But the film crew has agreed to stay within strict guidelines."
bilingual.target: “但是摄制组同意遵守严格的准则。”
这项任务对我来说是力所能及的。
他在五分钟以内就到了。
他们在一定的范围内工作。

bilingual.source: He stood within my line of sight.
bilingual.target: 他站在我的视线范围内。

yingyinNormal.en: They live, Jake, within Eywa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们还活着，杰克，他们和爱娃在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Within minutes, you will be dead. Okay. Got it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 几分钟之内就会毙命。好的。明白了？

yingyinNormal.en: Twenty bucks says they're married within the month.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我赌二十块钱，他们一个月内就会结婚。

yingyinNormal.en: Within 30 years, we could have a colony of hundreds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 三十年后，就会有几百人的殖民地了。

yingyinNormal.en: He was within my view from approximately 6:55 to 7:45.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他一直在我视线内，大概6:55到7:45之间都在。

yingyinNormal.en: Increased acceleration toward the object. Estimated contact within two minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 朝目标移动的加速度已增加。预计两分钟后到达目标。

yingyinNormal.en: Within 48 hours, he was picked up by the Houston Rockets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 48小时后他被休斯敦火箭队接收

yingyinNormal.en: I was with Mr. Sweeney, or within his sights, from 6:55 until 7:45.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直跟斯威尼先生在一起，或者说在他视线里，从6:55到7:45都在。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm still within earshot! You may want to wait for my door to close.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在还能听得到！你们得等我把门关上。

yingyinNormal.en: Professor? What exactly does legend tell us lies within the Chamber?
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦格教授？传说有没有告诉我们密室中的东西是什么？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: We can't start a hack on them until they're within a two mile range.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们要在两英里范围之内我们才能开始攻击他们的系统。

yingyinNormal.en: All of these policies are common sense. All of them are within our reach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有这些政策都是常识性的，所有这些都在我们能力范围之内。

yingyinNormal.en: Emotions run deep within our race, in many ways more deeply than in humans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的种族把情感隐藏的很深，在很多情况下，要比人类深得多。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you mean? You said 82% find employment within a year of graduating.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？你说82%都在毕业后的一年内找到了工作。

yingyinNormal.en: In my case, that time has fallen within the very first days of my presidency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我而言我上任之初就要面对这个难题了。

yingyinNormal.en: To have a desire build up within you and be denied any opportunity for release.
yingyinNormal.zh: 心中逐渐建立起了强烈的欲望，最后却只能憋着，无处释放。

yingyinNormal.en: Not just for the treasure within, but for where it lies, its strategic position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不只是为了山里的财宝，更是为了它的战略位置。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: They've somehow created a hyper-lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们在星球内部建造了某种超光速武器。

yingyinNormal.en: But she warned him not to be deceived by appearances. For beauty is found within.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但老婆婆警告王子不要以貌取人，真正的美在于内心。

yingyinNormal.en: Choose wisdom over wrath. Heal any rifts within yourself, your armies, your people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 选择智取而非力敌，治愈你自己，你的敌人和你的子民心中的裂痕。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: inside or not further than an area or period of time

examination_example.sentence: Research by the World Economic Forum finds that on average 42 per cent of the "core skills" <highlight>within</highlight> job roles will change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界经济论坛的研究发现，工作角色中平均有42%的“核心技能”会发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: For one thing, it is very slow compared to the pace of change <highlight>within</highlight> the digital economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，与数字经济内部的变化速度相比，它非常缓慢。

examination_example.sentence: The supermarket is designed to lure customers into spending as much time as possible <highlight>within</highlight> its doors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家超市旨在吸引顾客尽可能多的待在门内。

examination_example.sentence: It is unclear whether the sequencing of a whole genome violates the patents of individual genes <highlight>within</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚全基因组测序是否侵犯了其中单个基因的专利。

examination_example.sentence: In the Internet age, it is particularly easy to see the resentment that has always been hidden <highlight>within</highlight> American society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在互联网时代，特别容易看到美国社会内部一直隐藏的怨恨。

examination_example.sentence: But many <highlight>within</highlight> the public sector suffer under the current system, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在当前的体制中，公共部门的许多人也深受其害。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不出(某范围或限度); 在(某范围)之内

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: inside the range or limits of something
sense_info_list.zh: 不出(某范围或限度); 在(某范围)之内

examination_example.sentence: It's also pushing ahead in 2016 <highlight>within</highlight> expansion of Bluemercury, the beauty chain it bought last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2016年，它还通过扩大去年购买的美容连锁店 Bluemercury 取得了进展。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Within</highlight> Italy, the great focus was Rome, whose ancient ruins and more recent achievements were shown to every Grand Tourist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意大利最引人注目的是罗马，它的古代遗迹和最新成就都展示在了每一位游客眼前。

sense_info_list.en:
before a particular period of time has passed; during a particular period of time
not further than a particular distance from something

examination_example.sentence: The source left her role <highlight>within</highlight> two weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 消息人士在两周内离开了她的职位。

sense_info_list.en: inside a certain area or space

examination_example.sentence: These all come from <highlight>within</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些都来自内部。

examination_example.sentence: However, our focus on countries can mask broad variations <highlight>within</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们对国家的关注可能掩盖了国家内部的广泛差异。

sense_info_list.en: before the end of a particular period of time

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不出(某范围或限度); 在(某范围)之内

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
before a particular period of time has passed; during a particular period of time
not further than a particular distance from something

examination_example.sentence: When you drop a piece of food on the floor, is it really OK to eat if you pick it up <highlight>within</highlight> five seconds?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你把一块食物掉在地上后，如果你在5秒钟内捡起来，真的可以吃吗？

examination_example.sentence: The trouble with those things is that <highlight>within</highlight> six months to a year, people are back to their original baseline levels of well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是，在6个月到1年的时间里，人们又回到了最初的幸福基线水平。

examination_example.sentence: About 75% of elderly parents who don't go to nursing homes live <highlight>within</highlight> 30 minutes of at least one of their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不去疗养院的老年父母中，约75%的人至少能在30分钟内与其中一个孩子住在一起。

sense_info_list.en: inside the range or limits of something
sense_info_list.zh: 不出(某范围或限度); 在(某范围)之内

examination_example.sentence: All the surveys found that people mixed up names <highlight>within</highlight> relationship groups such as grandchildren, friends and siblings but hardly ever crossed these boundaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的调查都发现，人们在诸如祖孙、朋友和兄弟姐妹等关系群体中混淆了名字，但几乎从未跨越过这些界限。

examination_example.sentence: The study also found that <highlight>within</highlight> that group, misnamings occurred where the names shared initial or internal sounds, like Jimmy and Joanie or John and Bob.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究还发现，在一个关系池里，当名字的开头或中间发音相同时，就会发生喊错名字的情况，比如Jimmy和Joanie，或者John和Bob。

examination_example.sentence: Hands, foods and utensils (器皿) can carry individual bacteria living in communities contained <highlight>within</highlight> a protective film.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手、食物和器皿可以携带生活在保护膜中的单个细菌。

examination_example.sentence: When it comes to security cameras, Post says it's a host's responsibility to make sure guests feel comfortable <highlight>within</highlight> their home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当谈论到监控摄像头时，Post 说，确保客人在家中感到舒适是主人的责任。

examination_example.sentence: Karen Sue, the Chinese-American mother of a fifth-grader and an eighth-grader, believes the competition <highlight>within</highlight> the district has gotten out of control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 凯伦·苏(Karen Sue)是一名华裔美国母亲，孩子一个上五年级，一个上八年级。她认为，学区内的竞争已经失控了。

sense_info_list.en: inside a certain area or space

examination_example.sentence: Whatever the measure, <highlight>within</highlight> that massive group, poverty is extremely diverse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论用什么标准衡量，在这个庞大的群体中，贫困是极其多样化的。

examination_example.sentence: The slugs can manufacture chlorophyll, the green pigment (色素) in plants that captures energy from sunlight, and hold these genes <highlight>within</highlight> their body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海蛞蝓能够制造叶绿素，即植物体内可以从阳光中捕获能量的绿色色素，并且可以把这种基因保存在体内。

sense_info_list.en: before the end of a particular period of time

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: before a particular period of time has passed; during a particular period of time; not further than a particular distance from something

examination_example.sentence: The first day I shut it off because I had placed it <highlight>within</highlight> arm's reach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一天，我把它关掉了，因为我把它放在伸手可及的地方。

examination_example.sentence: If you do not receive any update <highlight>within</highlight> six months, it means that your application has not been successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果您在六个月内没有收到任何更新的消息，则意味着您的申请没有成功。

examination_example.sentence: They settled in at a comfortable East Side cafe and <highlight>within</highlight> minutes, another customer was approaching their table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在东区一家舒适的咖啡馆落座，没过几分钟，就有另一位顾客走近他们的桌子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: before a particular period of time has passed; during a particular period of time; not further than a particular distance from something

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>within</highlight> six months, the tree grew a hundred feet tall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 六个月之内，这棵树就长到了一百英尺高。

examination_example.sentence: Keep trying, and you might surprisingly find hidden abilities <highlight>within</highlight> you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 继续努力，你可能会惊奇地发现自己隐藏的才能。

examination_example.sentence: Noisy towns are around the telescope <highlight>within</highlight> a 5-kilometer radius
examination_example.sentence_trans: 望远镜周围方圆5公里内都是嘈杂的城镇。
